edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.asynch

Class ClientAsynchBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.ReconfigurableAppClientAsync
      • edu.umass.cs.gnscommon.asynch.ClientAsynchBase
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.interfaces.AppRequestParser

    public class ClientAsynchBase
extends edu.umass.cs.reconfiguration.ReconfigurableAppClientAsync
    This class defines a basic asynchronous client to communicate with a GNS instance over TCP.
    Author:
    Westy

    • Field Detail

      • CLIENT_PACKET_TYPES

        public static final Set<edu.umass.cs.nio.interfaces.IntegerPacketType> CLIENT_PACKET_TYPES

      • DEFAULT_MIN_REFRESH_INTERVAL_FOR_SELECT

        public static final int DEFAULT_MIN_REFRESH_INTERVAL_FOR_SELECT
        The default interval (in seconds) before which a query will not be refreshed. In other words if you wait this interval you will get the latest from the database, otherwise you will get the cached value.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

                             edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.interfaces.RequestCallback callback)
                      throws IOException,
                             ClientException,
                             org.json.JSONException
        Returns a JSON object containing all of the guid meta information from a remote replica. This method returns meta data about the guid. If you want any particular field or fields of the guid you'll need to use one of the read methods.

      • lookupAccountRecord

        public long lookupAccountRecord(String accountGuid,
                                edu.umass.cs.gigapaxos.interfaces.RequestCallback callback)
                         throws IOException,
                                ClientException,
                                org.json.JSONException
        Returns a JSON object containing all of the account meta information for an account guid from a remote replica. This method returns meta data about the account associated with this guid if and only if the guid is an account guid. If you want any particular field or fields of the guid you'll need to use one of the read methods.
        Parameters:
        accountGuid -
        callback -
        Returns:
        the request id
        Throws:
        IOException
        ClientException
        org.json.JSONException

                                                PrivateKey privateKey,
                                                Object... keysAndValues)
                                         throws ClientException
        Creates a command object from the given CommandType and a variable number of key and value pairs with a signature parameter. The signature is generated from the query signed by the given guid.
